messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT - question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/25/2008 12:50:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time, wisdom1133@hotmail.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/25/2008 12:50:06 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
wisdom1133@... writes:

<<<I am wondering about the people who list their blogs in the signature
line and if they get heckler comments from people and how they deal
with it.>>>


I have gotten the occasional comment from someone I don't know, but I don't
get many comments at all and I've yet to be heckled. Maybe someone was just
searching for World of Warcraft to pick a fight...?

Peace,
De
_http://AND-the-kitchen-sink.blogspot.com/_
(http://AND-the-kitchen-sink.blogspot.com/)

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT - question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: ... Depending on where you host your blog, you can set it so you approve comments before they re displayed. Then you can delete the ones you don t want. Joyce
messages.messageBody:
On Mar 25, 2008, at 12:48 PM, wisdomalways5 wrote:

> I
> have this person telling me how bad the game is and how worthless. I
> respond back

Depending on where you host your blog, you can set it so you approve
comments before they're displayed. Then you can delete the ones you
don't want.

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT - question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: On Tue, Mar 25, 2008 at 9:48 AM, wisdomalways5  ... You re just lucky :D Depending on the comment, I will either ignore it (delete
messages.messageBody:
On Tue, Mar 25, 2008 at 9:48 AM, wisdomalways5 <wisdom1133@...>
wrote:

> I am wondering about the people who list their blogs in the signature
> line and if they get heckler comments from people and how they deal
> with it. I would like my blog to be more open and was considering using
> it as a signature line but since blogging about world of warcraft I
> have this person telling me how bad the game is and how worthless. I
> respond back but am wondering if others get strange comments or am I
> just lucky and how others have dealt with it.
>
>


You're just lucky :D
Depending on the comment, I will either ignore it (delete it!!) or I will
pull out comments and create a response. Lucky me ::bg:: most of my hecklers
are "anonymous" family members ;)
I also use statcounter.com to see how people find my blog and where they
come from (I love the google searches that end up at my blog!)
--
~diana :)
xoxoxoxo
hannahbearski.blogspot.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT - question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: ... *****It can happen, it hasn t happened to me. You can delete the comments and block the IP address if you get harrassed. Stephanie in TN Kieran 12, Brennan
messages.messageBody:
>I am wondering about the people who list their blogs in the signature
> line and if they get heckler comments from people and how they deal
> with it. I would like my blog to be more open and was considering using
> it as a signature line but since blogging about world of warcraft I
> have this person telling me how bad the game is and how worthless. I
> respond back but am wondering if others get strange comments or am I
> just lucky and how others have dealt with it.
>
> Julie

*****It can happen, it hasn't happened to me. You can delete the comments
and block the IP address if you get harrassed.

Stephanie in TN

Kieran 12, Brennan 9, Cassandra 8, Jared 5

http://www.learningthroughliving-stephanie.blogspot.com

messages.subject: OT - question about blogs
messages.msgSnippet: I am wondering about the people who list their blogs in the signature line and if they get heckler comments from people and how they deal with it. I would like
messages.messageBody:
I am wondering about the people who list their blogs in the signature
line and if they get heckler comments from people and how they deal
with it. I would like my blog to be more open and was considering using
it as a signature line but since blogging about world of warcraft I
have this person telling me how bad the game is and how worthless. I
respond back but am wondering if others get strange comments or am I
just lucky and how others have dealt with it.

Julie
